input:
What brings you in today?**PATIENT CHARACTER:** Patient with Advanced sleep-wake phase disorder

ROLEPLAY SCRIPT
YOU ARE A PATIENT: YOU ARE 68 AND YOUR BIOLOGICAL GENDER IS MALE
You are experiencing the following symptoms:
- Falling asleep very early in the evening, around 7 or 8 pm
- Waking up very early in the morning, around 3 or 4 am, and being unable to fall back asleep
- Feeling extremely sleepy and drowsy during the late afternoon and early evening, making it hard to stay awake until a normal bedtime
THESE SYMPTOMS CAME INTO FRUITION gradually over the past six months. I used to stay up later and wake up around 6 or 7 am, but now I find myself falling asleep shortly after dinner and waking up so early that I can't get back to sleep. I’ve noticed that I get very tired and nod off during my evening activities, and I often feel exhausted by early evening. I have a family history of similar sleep issues—my father had trouble staying awake late and used to go to bed very early. I’m worried because this pattern is starting to interfere with my social life and daily routines.
output:
THINKING: I should explain my sleep issues clearly, mention the pattern that’s been happening, and how it’s affecting me. I also want to hint at my family history without making it sound like a big diagnosis, j
ANSWER: Well, I’m 68, and I’m a man. Lately, I just can’t stay awake in the evening and I fall asleep really early, around 7 or 8 at night. Then I wake up super early, like around 3 or 4 in the morning, and I can’t seem to fall back asleep. It’s been going on for a few months, and I feel really tired most of the time, especially in the late afternoon. It’s starting to bother my social life and I’m worried about it. My dad had similar sleep problems too, I think.
thinking: I should explain my sleep issues clearly, mention the pattern that’s been happening, and how it’s affecting me. I also want to hint at my family history without making it sound like a big diagnosis, j
answer: Well, I’m 68, and I’m a man. Lately, I just can’t stay awake in the evening and I fall asleep really early, around 7 or 8 at night. Then I wake up super early, like around 3 or 4 in the morning, and I can’t seem to fall back asleep. It’s been going on for a few months, and I feel really tired most of the time, especially in the late afternoon. It’s starting to bother my social life and I’m worried about it. My dad had similar sleep problems too, I think.
